name: @rider/models
description: Includes all database items + operations as well as schema parsers & types that are used across Rider services.

scripts.db:watch: cd db && dotenvx run -- graphile-migrate watch
scripts.db:commit: cd db && dotenvx run -- graphile-migrate commit
scripts.db:migrate: cd db && dotenvx run -- graphile-migrate migrate
scripts.db:generate: cd db && dotenvx run -- zapatos && mv models/zapatos/* ./models/ && rm -rf models/zapatos
